[![](https://simplenode.co/img/ssdkvm.png)](http://simplenode.co)

**SSD KVM 256MB**

    256MB RAM

    $3.00 USD

**SSD KVM 512MB**

    512MB RAM
    1 CPU Core (E3-1270v2)

    $5.40 USD

**Where can I get one?**

Limited stock, get them with the coupon 'SSDPROMO'; https://simplenode.co/hostbill/cart/unmanaged-ssd-kvm/

You can check out our normal KVM plans here; https://simplenode.co/hostbill/cart/kvm-vps/

**Location**

Dallas, TX at Incero at CoreXchange.

**Network**

Looking Glass: http://lg.simpleno.de

SolusVM Control Panel, with a lot of ISOs. Please keep in mind that ISOs shown in the order form is not always our full selection. Open a ticket for custom ISOs.

**Shut up and take my money!**

We can take your money via. PayPal or, if you wish to pay via. BitCoins, we can accept your BitCoin payment with BitPay. Just select BitPay during checkout, and follow the instructions.
